dataList.dlg: Mm... It's Gregor. Well, feel free to talk to me unless I'm asleep.
Not a bad morning, is it?
C'mon, I know you're busy, but you gotta eat.
Another busy day, wasn't it. Good work out there.
So, what do you usually do in your free time, manager bud? I'd give you a cig... but I guess it won't be of any use for you.
My least favorite things? Those dark-shelled critters with a long pair of antennae. I especially hate the tenacity of those bugs refusing to die even in water.
Hey manager bud, you got a lens cleaner- Nevermind, forget I asked. Be glad that you won't ever have to wear glasses.

I know it's not the most flattering thing to say to a pal suffering from amnesia...
But I sometimes think there are a few memories I can live without. You get what I'm saying? It's like waiting for an end of a war that'll never come.

This thing would keep on regrowing every time I tried to cut it off. My arm, I mean. Or should I call it a leg...
It's basically my family now. In other words, I had to accept that I'm stuck with it, like it or hate it.
Hm? Manager bud? Where'd you scuttle off to?
Aight, I'll do what I can.
Go? You want me to...? Gah... Well, I guess I'll give it my all.
What, you got something to say?
Alright, here I go!
Whoa, that was a pretty clean hit.
Ah, shootâ€¦
Oh boy... Guess you've got work to do, eh, manager bud?
Check this out, manager bud! Did a pretty neat job, right?
I'm pretty sure I did tell you... This was my best.
Haah~ We beat 'em somehow. Nice work, manager bud.
I won't take any medals. Cigarettes, on the other hand, are welcome.
Sorry. Couldn't really keep my head in the game. It's just one of those days, I guess.
